Detailed Description

File including Main() -- only for hardware testing purposes.

test_hardware.cpp tests data acquisition accessing hw_access. It tests configuration (hardware, server config,...) through an xml-file, gathering DataPackets and rebuilding them from a RAW representation. --- This file is not intended to be included in the final project version! ---
